00032 namespace ebl {
00033 
00035   // supervised_trainer
00036 
00037   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00038   supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00039   supervised_trainer(fc_ebm2<state_idx, int, state_idx> &m, parameter &p)
00040     : machine(m), param(p), energy(), label(), age(0) {
00041     input = NULL; // allocated when input is passed, based in its order/dims
00042     energy.dx.set(1.0);
00043     energy.ddx.set(0.0);
00044   }
00045 
00046   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00047   supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::~supervised_trainer() {
00048     if (input) delete input;
00049   }
00050   
00051   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00052   int supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::run(Idx<double> &sample, 
00053                                              infer_param &infp) {
00054     IdxDim d(sample.spec);
00055     if (!input) input = new state_idx(d);
00056     else input->resize(d);
00057     idx_copy(sample, input->x); // copy sample in input state
00058     int answer = -1;
00059     machine.infer2(*input, answer, energy, infp); // infer answer from energies
00060     return answer;
00061   }
00062   
00063   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00064   bool supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00065   test_sample(Idx<double> &sample, int label, infer_param &infp) {
00066     int answer = run(sample, infp);
00067     return (label == answer); // return true if correct answer
00068   }
00069 
00070   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00071   Idx<double> supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00072   learn_sample(state_idx *input, int label, gd_param &args) {
00073     machine.fprop(*input, label, energy);
00074     param.clear_dx();
00075     machine.bprop(*input, label, energy);
00076     param.update(args);
00077     return energy.x.get();
00078   }
00079 
00080   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00081   void supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00082   test(LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel> &ds, classifier_meter &log) {
00083     ds.seek_begin();
00084     log.clear();
00085     for (int i = 0; i < ds.size(); ++i) {
00086       ds.fprop(*input, label);
00087       int lab = label.get();
00088       machine.fprop(*input, lab, energy);
00089       //      log.update(age, output, label.get(), energy);
00090       ds.next();
00091     }
00092   }
00093   
00094   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00095   void supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00096   train(LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel> &ds, classifier_meter &log, 
00097         gd_param &args, int niter) {
00098     ds.seek_begin();
00099     log.clear();
00100     IdxDim d(ds.data.spec);
00101     if (!input) input = new state_idx(d);
00102     else input->resize(d);
00103     for (int i = 0; i < niter; ++i) {
00104       ds.fprop(*input, label);
00105       int lab = label.get();
00106       learn_sample(input, lab, args);
00107       //      log.update(age, output, label.get(), energy);
00108       age++;
00109       ds.next();
00110     }
00111   }
00112 
00113   template <class Tdata, class Tlabel>  
00114   void supervised_trainer<Tdata, Tlabel>::
00115   compute_diaghessian(LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel> &ds, intg niter, 
00116                       double mu) {
00117     IdxDim d(ds.data.spec);
00118     if (!input) input = new state_idx(d);
00119     else input->resize(d);
00120     param.clear_ddeltax();
00121     for (int i = 0; i < niter; ++i) {
00122       ds.fprop(*input, label);
00123       int lab = label.get();
00124       machine.fprop(*input, lab, energy);
00125       param.clear_dx();
00126       machine.bprop(*input, lab, energy);
00127       param.clear_ddx();
00128       machine.bbprop(*input, lab, energy);
00129       param.update_ddeltax((1 / (double) niter), 1.0);
00130       ds.next();
00131     }
00132     param.compute_epsilons(mu);
00133     cout << "diaghessian inf: " << idx_min(param.epsilons);
00134     cout << " sup: " << idx_max(param.epsilons) << endl;
00135   }
00136 
00137 } // end namespace ebl
